trans-unit.source: Represents the evidence used to render an authorization decision for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authorized to access a specific resource.
The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>.
An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.
The SamlEvidence class represents the evidence used by a SAML authority to render an authorization decision for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>.

The evidence is specified as SAML assertions or a reference to SAML assertions, which refer to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> properties, respectively.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> class.
This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> class using the specified set of SAML assertions.
Use this constructor when you have a collection of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> objects, but no SAML assertion references.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions*> property.
assertions contains a member that is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> class using the specified set of SAML assertion references.
Use this constructor when you have a collection of SAML assertion references, but no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> objects.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains an identifier for a SAML assertion that specifies the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences*> property.
assertionIdReferences contains a member that is or empty.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> class using the specified set of SAML assertion references and SAML assertions.
Use this constructor when you have a collection of SAML assertion references and a collection of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> objects.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains an identifier for a SAML assertion that specifies the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences*> property.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions*> property.
assertionIdReferences contains a member that is or empty.
-or- assertions contains a member that is .
-or- assertionIdReferences and assertions are both .
Gets a collection of identifiers for SAML assertions that specify the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.

The AssertionIdReferences property corresponds to the `\<saml:AssertionIDReference>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains identifiers for SAML assertions that specify the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Gets the collection of SAML assertions that comprise the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `\<saml:Assertion>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Causes this instance to be read-only.
When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
Reads the evidence from the specified XML reader.
The ReadXml method sets the following properties: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A>
A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the evidence.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authorization statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
reader is .
-or- samlSerializer is .
reader refers to an XML element that does not have at least one or child element.
Writes the evidence into the specified XML serializer.
Use the WriteXml method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence> instance into a `<saml:Evidence>` element.
A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the evidence.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
writer is .
-or- samlSerializer is .
